mapper.select: SELECT Z.ZZIMS,P.*, M.*,S.* FROM PHOTOGRAPHER P, MEMBER M,STUDIO S,(SELECT CTGR_NUM,COUNT(*) ZZIMS FROM ZZIM GROUP BY CTGR_NUM) Z WHERE P.PTG_ID = M.ID AND M.ID = Z.CTGR_NUM(+) AND M.ID = S.ST_ID(+) AND P.PTG_ID = #{ptgId}

SELECT NVL(Z.ZZIMS,0),P.*,M.* FROM PHOTOGRAPHER P, MEMBER M,(SELECT CTGR_NUM,COUNT(*) ZZIMS FROM ZZIM GROUP BY CTGR_NUM ORDER BY 2 DESC) Z WHERE P.PTG_ID = M.ID AND M.ID = Z.CTGR_NUM(+)
ORDER BY P.REGI_DATE DESC ORDER BY M.NAME
